metadata.title: CVE-2019-7659 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Genivia gSOAP 2.7.x and 2.8.x before 2.8.75 allows attackers to cause adenial of service (application abort) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact if a server application is built with the -DWITH_COOKIES flag. Thisaffects the C/C++ libgsoapck/libgsoapck++ and libgsoapssl/libgsoapssl++libraries, as these are built with that flag.

criterions.comment: gsoap package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
